Package pacmangameplay.gamelogic

Class Summary
BonusControl This class controls when and for how long the bonus symbols appear.
BonusSymbol Contains all the information about a bonus symbol.
DotCounter Used to control when the ghosts can leave their pen.
DotCounterControl Controls all the dot counters in the game: 3 personal counters, Blinky's Elroy counter, the global counter, and the last dot timer.
LevelLogic Controls and updates all the information needed for one full level.
LevelSpecs Contains all the level specifications for the game.
ModeControl Modes: 1 scatter 2 chase 3 frightened 4 elroy (used only by Blinky)
ToleranceEquals Checks if any 2 times or positions are close enough to be considered equal.
 

Enum Summary
BonusSymbol.Name  
DotCounter.Status  
DotCounter.Type
